Headline: Tomato Breeder & Senior Breeding Strategist | R&D Leadership | Innovation & Product Strategy | AI-Driven Prediction Breeding Models | Design & Systems Thinking | Process Excellence | Sustainable Agriculture
Comment:
Our neighbour China is a powerful source of inspiration!

People often assume that all Chinese products in the Indian market exist only because of heavy VC funding. Yes, funding helped many Chinese tech companies scale rapidly, but their true strength lies in speed, creativity, and a strong manufacturing ecosystem.

What we buy from China ‚Äî whether products or services ‚Äî clearly shows how fast they innovate, execute, and bring ideas to the market. This is the pace India needs to learn from.
It‚Äôs not about copying, but watching, learning, adapting, and matching the speed.

To accelerate our own progress, the government should create dedicated ‚Äústudy groups‚Äù to continuously monitor global innovation, bring home the best ideas, improve them, and compete globally.
In today‚Äôs world, speed of invention, speed of execution, and speed of capturing the market decide who leads in business.

India has the talent, we just need the mindset and the urgency.
